DataInput._comment: ----------Model variables----------
Intracellular glucose concentration, mM
Effective rate of vesicle  trafficking towards the cellular periphery, m s^{-1}
Number of activation patches per vesicle, -
Number of insulin vesicles in one beta cell, -
Amount of insulin in one vesicle, pmol
Radius of the beta cell, um
Diffusion coefficient of insulin vesicles in the beta cell, A^2 fs^{-1}
Insulin secretion rate of one beta cell, pM min^{-1}
----------Model parameters----------
Correlation between insulin secretion rate and the force coefficient of vesicle transport, m s^{-1} pM^{-1} min
Correlation between insulin secretion rate and the number of insulin vesicles in the cell, pM^{-1} min
Coefficient for the number of activation patches on the vesicle surface accelerating insulin secretion rate, pM min^{-1}
Coefficient for the intracellular glucose concentration stimulating the insulin secretion, pM min^{-1} mM^{-1}
Coefficient for the number of insulin molecules in each vesicle determining insulin secretion rate, pM min^{-1}
Coefficient for the vesicle diffusion promoting insulin secretion rate, pM min^{-1} A^{-2} fs
Coefficient for the cell radius reducing insulin secretion rate, pM min^{-1}  Î¼m^{-1}
----------Parameters for the model inferences----------
Scale for the minimum covariance in the model
Time slices to sample
